title: Question about the Login Screen
body:
Now im sure the Man in the picture is Pantheon (but has the power to summon a beam from the sky?)
But who is the monster hes fighting? 
Ive always wondered ._.

replies.body: It's pantheon using smite on the jungle monster, not sure which one though

Which jungle monster IS IT?

If you think it's a Blue buff snaaaapchat your %%%%% to "**RyanWilson910**".
If you think it's a Red buff snaaaaapchat your %%%%% to "**PhreakyPhreak910**".
it's panth smiting red......how could you not get that??????

ARE YOU %%%%ING KIDDING ME

Its pantheon smiting red buff...
lel its not the first time its been on logscreen. just fyi
Im pretty sure that its red buff.
